00074 class DZ_EXPORT DzBrickParam : public DzBase
00075 {
00076     Q_OBJECT
00077     Q_ENUMS(ParamDirection)
00078     Q_ENUMS(ParamType)
00079     friend class DzShaderBrick;
00080     friend class DzBrickSet;
00081     friend class DzBrickGroup;
00082 
00083 public:
00084     DzBrickParam();
00085     virtual ~DzBrickParam();
00086 
00087     enum ParamDirection { None = 0, In, Out, AOV };
00088     enum ParamType { Unknown = 0, Float, Color, Point, Vector, Normal, Matrix, String };
00089 
00090     //DzBase
00091     virtual void        loadSection( DzInFile *file, short sectionID );
00092     virtual void        setPointer( const DzInFile *file, short sectionID, short pointerID, DzBase *ptr );
00093     virtual void        save( DzOutFile *file ) const;
00094     static QString      typeToString(int i);
00095     static ParamType    stringToType( const QString &typeString );
00096     
00097     QString             getStringOfTokens() const;
00098     void                setTokensWithString( const QString &str );
00099     void                clearTokens();
00100 
00101 public slots:
00102     
00103     QString         getLabel() const;
00104     void            setLabel( const QString &label );
00105 
00106     void            setIsAdvanced(bool onOff);
00107     bool            getIsAdvanced() const;
00108     
00109     //pure virtual slots
00110     virtual int             getNumTokensNeeded() const = 0;
00111     virtual int             getNumArgs() const = 0;
00112     virtual QString         getArg( int i ) const = 0;
00113     virtual ParamType       getArgType( int i ) const = 0;
00114     virtual DzProperty*     getProperty( int i ) const = 0;
00115     //index in token array of map token or -1 if no map token
00116     //i = index of the property
00117     virtual int             getPropertyMapToken( int i ) const = 0;
00118     //Property count must be >= token count
00119     //if properties are mapped, map tokens should appear
00120     //in order after tokens for standard properties
00121     virtual int             getNumProperties() const = 0;
00122     virtual ParamDirection  getDirection() const = 0;
00123     
00124     //over all param type
00125     virtual ParamType       getType() const = 0;
00126 
00127     //used for the shader default values on the tokens
00128     virtual QString         getStringValue( int i ) const = 0;
00129 
00130     virtual QString         getPropertyPath( int i ) const;
00131     virtual void            setPropertyPath( int i, const QString &path );
00132 
00133     virtual QString         getToken( int i ) const;
00134     //type for individual tokens
00135     virtual ParamType       getTypeForToken( int i ) const { return getType(); }
00136     
00137     
00138     virtual QString         writeShaderPrep() const { return QString(); }
00139 
00140     //if a param need to be set up before a the "function" call is made
00141     //this should return true. 
00142     //this call is not relevant for Out or AOV direction params
00143     virtual bool            needsPrepForCall( int i ) { return false; }
00144 
00145     //Return the shader code;
00146     //The params preped val will need to be in the new token at the end of the code snid bit
00147     //The token will be the same type as getType() of class uniform
00148     //Thus only uniform vars (other tokens) should be used to compose it
00149     virtual QString         writeCallPrep( const QString &newToken , int i ) const { return QString(); }
00150     
00151     //token needs to be in the list of parameters for the final shader
00152     virtual bool    shouldWriteTokenInShader( int i ) const { return false; }
00153 
00154     virtual bool    isArray() const;
00155     virtual void    setIsArray( bool onoff );
00156     virtual int     getOutputArraySize() const;
00157     virtual void    setOutputArraySize( int i );
00158     virtual bool    giveArrayAsList() const;
00159     virtual void    setGiveArrayAsList( bool onoff );
00160             
00161     //if a global default val is not empty and the param is not connected
00162     //the params tokens will not be written and instead the final token
00163     //will be set to the global var val
00164     //this is only used for params with an "In" direction
00165     virtual QString getDefaultGlobalValue() const;
00166     virtual void    setDefaultGlobalValue( const QString &val );
00167 
00168     virtual DzShaderBrick*  getTopBrickOwner() const;
00169     virtual int             getScopePosition() const;
00170     virtual void            setScopePosition( int position );
00171 
00172     //simple wraps of static functions for scripting
00173     virtual QString getTypeString( int i ) const;
00174     virtual QString getVecString( int type, const DzVec3 &vec ) const;
00175     virtual QString getColorString( const QColor &color, const QString &space = "rgb" ) const;
00176     virtual QString getFloatString( float val ) const;
00177     virtual QString getMatrixString( const DzMatrix4 &matrix ) const;
00178     virtual QString getEscapedString( const QString &string ) const;
00179     virtual QString getNewToken() const;
00180 
00181     //connection functions
00182     virtual bool            canConnect( DzBrickParam *param ) const;
00183     
00184     int                     getNumConnections() const;
00185     DzParamConnection*      getConnection( int i ) const;
00186     void                    addConnection( DzBrickParam *param );
00187     void                    removeConnection( int i );
00188     void                    removeConnection( DzBrickParam *param );
00189     void                    removeAllConnections();
00190     void                    moveConnectionsToParam( DzBrickParam *param );
00191     virtual QString         simpleText() const;
00192 
00193     virtual bool                isDirectPropDrivenOutput() const { return false; }
00194     virtual DzPropertyParam*    getDirectDrivingProperty() const { return NULL; }
00195 
00196 signals:
00197     void    propertyChanged( DzProperty *prop );
00198     void    propertyListChanged();
00199     void    removed();
00200     void    connectionsChanged();
00201     void    invalidateFiles();
00202     void    typeChanged();
00203     void    labelChanged();
00204 
00205 protected:
00206     virtual void        setTokenInBuffer() = 0;
00207     virtual void        setOwner( DzShaderBrick *brick );
00208 
00209     //data
00210     struct  Data;
00211     Data    *m_data;
00212 
00213 private:
00214     void    removeConnectionLink( int i );
00215     void    addConnectionLink( DzParamConnection &con, DzBrickParam *param );
00216     
00217 };
